Welcome !

Wakanda AI is a cross-university project currently implemented by the African Language Technologies Group (ALT Gr) under the AFRETEC Network.
This project aims to help bridge the gap in linguistic technology by focusing on African languages.
Our mission is to develop innovative speech processing tools and resources that promote inclusiveness, accessibility, and digital transformation across diverse communities in Africa.

Objectives

  • Help address communication barriers for African languages
  • Contribute to advancing speech processing technologies for underrepresented languages
  • Promote cross-cultural understanding and collaboration
